text: Va qavmas sitoʙon nazdi u omadand va onon pes az in korhoi zist (livota) ancom medodand. Lut guft: «Ej qavmi man, inho duxtaroni man (ja'ne, duxtaroni ummati man) hastand, pas, onhoro nikoh kuned, ki ʙaroi izdivoci Sumo pokizatarand. Az Alloh ʙitarsed va maro dar ʙaroʙari mehmononam ʙad makuned. Ojo mardi xiradmande dar mijoni sumo nest?»
